actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To provide for demonstration projects to test whether enrollment in the supplemental security income program can be significantly increased by offering nonprofit organizations financial incentives to engage in outreach.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to: (1) enter into contracts to provide for demonstration projects to test whether enrollment in the Supplemental Security Income program under title XVI of the Social Security Act can be significantly increased by offering private organizations financial incentives to engage in outreach; and (2) report to the Congress on the results of such projects.

titles.title: To provide for demonstration projects to test whether enrollment in the supplemental security income program can be significantly increased by offering nonprofit organizations financial incentives to engage in outreach.
